item.title: We're going to the Olympics! What do you want to know?
item.description: Here's how to send your questions and curiosities to the NPR team covering the Winter Olympics in Milan.

item.title: Many Americans say the U.S. is not a moral leader but want it to be: NPR/Ipsos poll

item.title: The Golden Globes are this weekend. Hear from some of the nominees
item.description: The Golden Globe are Sunday night. Revisit some of the nominees that have appeared on NPR's "Morning Edition" this past year.
